overview: Experience Shakespeare’s comedic masterpiece from the Public Theater’s Shakespeare in the Park. Set in South Harlem, the play tells the story of the trickster Falstaff and the wily wives who outwit him in a celebration of Black joy, laughter and vitality.

production_companies.name: The Public Theater (Oskar Eustis, Artistic Director; Patrick Willingham, Executive Director)

title: Merry Wives
